description: Accession Number. The 20-character string formed from the 18-digit number assigned by the Commission to each EDGAR submission. submission_number: [adsh]
name: submission_number

description: Sequential number for grouping arcs in a submission. group: [grp]
name: group

description: Sequential number for arcs within a group in a submission.
name: arc

description: Indicates a weight of -1 (TRUE if the arc is negative), but typically +1 (FALSE).
name: negative

description: The tag for the parent of the arc parent_tag: [ptag]
name: parent_tag

description: The version of the tag for the parent of the arc parent_version: [pversion]
name: parent_version

description: The tag for the child of the arc child_tag: [ctag]
name: child_tag

description: The version of the tag for the child of the arc child_version: [cversion]
name: child_version
